title: Syd tutor kept photos of pupils: court (AAP)
content:
A Sydney maths tutor accused of molesting his students kept "several dozen" head-shots of his students on his mobile phone, a court has heard. 

Quy Huy Hoang, 67, has pleaded not guilty to 12 counts of abuse including sexual intercourse with a child and indecent assault. 

The crimes were allegedly committed against five of his pupils, all aged below eight, in three family homes between 2007 and 2
